item.title: PREP
item.description: PREP PREP is a framework for making your point. PREP: Point + Reason + Example + Point Point: Make a point; PREP is a good method. Reason: Give the reason; Because it has a clear logic. Example: Show examples; The famous XYZ did ABC and everyone was convinced. Point: State the point for conclusion.
